title: How long will it take to cover NCERT books for UPSC CSE? - Quora
tags: National Council of Educational Research and Training (NCERT)

response.answer_text: Your target is to complete UPSC CSE in one year you read NCERTS with in 45 days Polity 11 th & 12th Geography 6 to 12 History 6 to 12 Economics 9 to 12 Environment 11 & 12 Art and culture 11 & 12 You have no basic knowledge about UPSC CSE you read all NCERTS with in 2 months or 3 months
